ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.Core
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICore

     class Core
extends Object
implements ICore
    This is an implementation of the ICore interface. This class gives access to all important core services (facade pattern).
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)
